name: Play The Game (Rooms4Rockets)
description:
A fun game is hidden by a complex menu, will you get through the errors, text-to-rage machine and the unholy mess what is the code of the menu screen to finally play the strawberry eating claw robot catching bonanza? Probably not... but lets laugh at the dumb AI raging of the broken menu, when you Play The Game!

Play The Game is a platformer game where a giant claw eats strawberries whilst chasing you, the robot... well, it would be if somebody would fix the damn menu screen!

(This game is satire - there is hardly any platforming but the elements of the game are not listed to the give the Player a first look experience with no idea of what will happen. Please keep this in mind if you're planning to make media such as Let's Play videos or reviews. Thanks -Alex (Curator)
